programme.title: Flaming Cloud
programme.desc: Above the clouds lies a celestial casino where the Gods of heaven bet on the sorrows and joys of Earth for their own amusement. One day, they choose a newborn baby boy, Sangui, and curse him with a strange affliction: everyone he kisses falls into a deep slumber, and only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Jiang Yi, aiming to mend fences between Huang Ying Zi and Fang Ming Yu, and Huang Ying Zi trying to fulfill Zhuang Yuan's wishes, both coincidentally come up with the idea of a New Year's gift exchange party.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: While interviewing Ding Ye, Huang Ying Zi sees Lan Yi Fei's father, Lan Bin, who has been missing for many years. Huang Ying Zi wants to help Lan Yi Fei find her father.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting is pregnant; unable to contact Chen Shi, she waits for him near his house. She tells Chen Shi and Lin Li about her pregnancy, leaving them shocked. Lin Li gives the divorce documents to Chen Shi, asking for his signature as she knows that the marriage cannot be salvaged. Si Yuan is unable to accept the fact that her parents are getting a divorced.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li resigns and decides to move back to her mother's home. Si Yuan feels helpless when Lin Li persuades her to accept Yu Ting. Lin Li bumps into Dong Sheng at Li Jiao's void deck, causing Dong Sheng to feel awkward. Fortunately, Lin Li is unaware that the guy she spent the night with at the hotel is Dong Sheng. Dong Sheng is secretly delighted to find out that they are going to be housemates.

programme.title: Flaming Cloud
programme.desc: Above the clouds lies a celestial casino where the Gods of heaven bet on the sorrows and joys of Earth for their own amusement. One day, they choose a newborn baby boy, Sangui, and curse him with a strange affliction: everyone he kisses falls into a deep slumber, and only true love can break the spell.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle visits the Lunasia Dim Sum House to learn how to make a beautiful hargow and enjoy a traditional Cantonese tea brunch.

programme.title: Out of Place
programme.desc: A photographer returns to her hometown in China after years in France, to find that her former lover and close friend have built a happy family together. Her return subtly disrupts the balance of their lives and emotions.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Xie Wan Ru misunderstands that Wang Xuan had framed Madame Zheng and demands an apology.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Wang Xuan arrives just before Xie Wan Ru dies and accepts the important task entrusted to the crown prince.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: A drunken Chi-lam crashes her car. Ka-pik offers some kind words to her.

programme.title: The Heir to the Throne
programme.desc: Chi-bun makes a love confession to Hiu-ling. Ho-yee is imprisoned for six weeks.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: While looking for Lan Bin, Huang Ying Zi tries to find out about Jiang Yi and Chloe's relationship. Meanwhile, Jiang Yi is also trying to find out about Huang Ying Zi and Ding Ye's relationship.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: Jiang Yi opts to relaunch his game by adapting Ding Ye's IP. Huang Ying Zi takes him to the restaurant where Ding Ye works, but Jiang Yi and Ding Ye end up in conflict. Frustrated, Ding Ye demands that Huang Ying Zi choose between Jiang Yi and her interview.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Si Yuan tells Yu Ting that she will try to get along with her, Chen Shi overhears this and is relieved. The father-daughter relationship starts to improve, but Yu Ting is suspicious about Si Yuan's sudden change of attitude. Si Yuan secretly tells Li Jiao that she has not accepted Yu Ting, she wants to sow discord between Yu Ting and her father so her parents can reconcile; Yu Ting hears this.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Ming and Bernard reach an agreement to collaborate on promoting products on livestreams; Wen Yu looks on with disdain. Upon seeing the two bicker, Bernard suggests that they compete, to see who can sell the most products within a given timeframe. The two try their best and their sales are neck and neck. Wen Yu uses Dong Shengís social media accounts to purchase the products, earning a victory.
